Aegis.card_desc: [Shield] Your Shield has an infinite duration and its Cooldown is reduced by 2s.

Brand.card_desc: [Fireball] Heal for {scale=100|100} for each enemy hit with Fireball.

Dire Need.card_desc: [Shield] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% while using Shield.

Fearless Leader.card_desc: [Armor] Reduce your active Cooldowns by {scale=10|10}% after getting an Elimination.

Formidable.card_desc: [Armor] Heal for 55% of your maximum Health over 3s when you fall to or below 40% of your maximum Health. This can occur once every 45s.

Heat Transfer.card_desc: [Shield] Reduce the Cooldown of Charge by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for every 1000 damage your Shield takes.

Hot Pursuit.card_desc: [Fireball] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 3s after hitting an enemy with Fireball.

Immovable Object.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Healing received from others by {scale=5|5}% while at or below 50% Health.

Incinerate.card_desc: [Fireball] Reduce the Cooldown of Fireball by {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Last Stand.card_desc: [Shield] Heal for {scale=100|100} every 1s while Shield is active and you are at or below 40% Health.

Launch.card_desc: [Charge] Increase the travel distance of Charge by {scale=15|15}%.

Looks That Kill.card_desc: [Fireball] Reduce the Cooldown of Charge by {scale=0.6|0.6}s after hitting an enemy with Fireball.

Running Start.card_desc: [Charge] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s after using Charge.

Safe Travel.card_desc: [Charge] Gain a {scale=150|150}-Health Shield for 3s after you use Charge.

Scorch.card_desc: [Fireball] Increase the damage of Fireball by 30% and deal 20% increased damage for each subsequent target hit after the first.

Towering Barrier.card_desc: [Shield] Reduce the Cooldown of Shield by {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Unstoppable Force.card_desc: [Charge] Apply a Knockback of {scale=800|200} to enemies hit by Charge.

\u00c4gis.card_desc: [Schild] Dein Schild währt beliebig lang und die Abklingzeit wird um 2s reduziert.

Beeindruckend.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter 40% Gesundheit, heilst du über 3s 55% deiner maximalen LP. Kann nur einmal alle 45s ausgelöst werden.

Brandmarken.card_desc: [Feuerball] Für jeden mit Feuerball getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Brandspuren.card_desc: [Feuerball] Erhöht den Schaden von Feuerball um 30% und fügt nach dem ersten getroffenen Zielen 20% Bonusschaden zu.

Entz\u00fcnden.card_desc: [Feuerball] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Feuerball um {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Fliegender Start.card_desc: [Ansturm] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Verwendung von Ansturm 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Gewaltige Barriere.card_desc: [Schild] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Schild um {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Kavalier.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=150|150} LP.

Letztes Gefecht.card_desc: [Schild] Bei 40% oder weniger Gesundheit und aktivem Schild wirst du pro Sekunde {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Mutiger Anf\u00fchrer.card_desc: [Rüstung] Eliminierungen reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=10|10}%.

Schreckliche Not.card_desc: [Schild] Erhöht dein Lauftempo bei aktivem Schild um {scale=8|8}%.

Sichere Reise.card_desc: [Ansturm] Gewährt nach Ansturm 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=150|150} LP.

Starres Objekt.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung durch andere Spieler.

Starter.card_desc: [Ansturm] Erhöht die Reichweite von Ansturm um {scale=15|15}%.

T\u00f6dliche Blicke.card_desc: [Feuerball] Treffer mit Feuerball reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Ansturm um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Verfolgungsjagd.card_desc: [Feuerball] Triffst du einen Gegner mit Feuerball, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

W\u00e4rme\u00fcbertragung.card_desc: [Schild] Für je 1000 Schaden, die dein Schild erleidet, wird die Abklingzeit von Ansturm um {scale=0.5|0.5}s reduziert.

Allonge.card_desc: [Charge] La distance de Charge augmente de {scale=15|15}%.

Beaut\u00e9 ravageuse.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Toucher un ennemi avec Boule de feu diminue le temps de recharge de Charge de {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Besoin urgent.card_desc: [Bouclier] Tant que le Bouclier est actif, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

Carboniser.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Boule de feu inflige 30% de dégâts supplémentaires, et encore 20% de plus par cible touchée après la première.

Chef intr\u00e9pide.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=10|10}%.

Dernier combat.card_desc: [Bouclier] Si le Bouclier est actif et que vos PV passent en dessous de 40%, vous regagnez {scale=100|100} PV/s jusqu'à avoir 40% de PV.

\u00c9gide.card_desc: [Bouclier] Votre Bouclier n'expire jamais et il se recharge 2s plus vite.

Flambeau.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Toucher un ennemi avec Boule de feu rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Inamovible.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus en provenance des alliés.

Incin\u00e9rer.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Boule de feu se recharge {scale=0.4|0.4}s plus vite.

Invincible.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en dessous de 40% de PV redonne 55% des PV max. en 3s. Cet effet ne peut se produire que toutes les 45s.

Longueur d'avance.card_desc: [Charge] Charge augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Poursuite ardente.card_desc: [Boule de feu] Toucher un ennemi avec Boule de feu augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 3s.

Transfert thermique.card_desc: [Bouclier] Le temps de recharge de Charge est réduit de {scale=0.5|0.5}s par tranche de 1000 dégâts subis par votre Bouclier.

Voyage s\u00fbr.card_desc: [Charge] Après Charge, vous obtenez un bouclier de {scale=150|150} PV qui dure 3s.

\u4e0d\u52a8\u5982\u5c71.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%的控制抗性和减速抗性

\u51b2\u523a\u8d77\u8dd1.card_desc: [冲锋] 使用冲锋后你将获得{scale=10|10}%移动速度加成，持续3秒

\u575a\u6301\u4e0d\u61c8.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 当你的生命值在守护壁垒激活的情况下低于40%时，你将每秒得到{scale=100|100} 点治疗直到生命值回复到40%

\u5854\u76fe\u58c1\u5792.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 增加{scale=500|500}点护盾生命值

\u5b89\u5168\u65c5\u884c.card_desc: [冲锋] 冲锋后获得{scale=150|150}点伤害护盾，持续3秒

\u5f15\u71c3.card_desc: [火球喷射] 减少火球喷射的冷却时间{scale=10|10}%

\u65e0\u60e7\u4e4b\u529b.card_desc: [冲锋] 冲锋将造成强度为{scale=800|200}的击退效果

\u65e0\u754f\u9886\u8896.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌方时所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=10|10}%

\u706b\u901f\u6551\u63f4.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 使用守护壁垒时移动速度提升{scale=5|5}%。

\u70c8\u7130\u9a91\u58eb.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射的伤害提高30%，且命中多个目标时，每个后续目标受到的伤害依次提高30%

\u70d9\u5370.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射会使目标受到的治疗效果降低{scale=15|15}%，持续3秒

\u70ed\u4f20\u5bfc.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 你的护盾每受到1000伤害，冲锋的冷却时间就减少{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u70ed\u529b\u8ffd\u8e2a.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射命中敌人将使你的移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续2秒

\u795e\u5723\u62a4\u76fe.card_desc: [守护壁垒] 守护壁垒持续时间无限，冷却时间降低至12秒

\u8363\u8000\u51fb\u6740.card_desc: [火球喷射] 火球喷射命中敌人时，回复{scale=20|20}发弹药

\u9a91\u58eb\u5c0a\u4e25.card_desc: [护甲] 在生命值低于40%时，会在3秒内回复最大生命值的55%

\u9a91\u58eb\u7cbe\u795eI.card_desc: [护甲] 增加你的基础生命值上限{scale=150|150}点

Dire Need.card_desc: [Shield] Allies within 30 units gain a 200 damage Shield for five seconds when you activate your Shield.

Evolve.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your base maximum Health by 15%

Field Dressing.card_desc: [Armor] While standing near an objective, you spawn a HP Drop every 5s that heals for 100.

Heat Transfer.card_desc: [Shield] Every 400 Damage your shield takes reduces the cooldown of fireball by 1s.

Hot Pursuit.card_desc: [Fireball] Hitting an enemy with fireball increases your movement speed by 10% for 3s.

Immovable Object.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {25}% knockback reduction when on the Objective.

Last Stand.card_desc: [Shield][+20% Per Rank] While Shield is active you reduce the duration of all Damage Over Time effects by {40/60/80/100}%.

Launch.card_desc: [Charge] Increase the distance of Charge by 25%.

Looks That Kill.card_desc: [Fernando] Hitting an enemy with Fireball recharges {10}% of your maximum ammo.

Pyre.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the ammo cost of firing your flame lance by 15%.

Running Start.card_desc: [Armor] You gain 15% Movement Speed for 3s upon dismounting. 45s Cooldown.

Safe Travel.card_desc: [Charge] Gain a 200 damage Shield for 5s after you Charge.

Towering Barrier.card_desc: [Shield] Increase the size of Shield by 75% and increases its Health by 300.

Buen viaje.card_desc: [Carga] Obtienes un escudo de {scale=150|150} PS durante 3s tras usar Cargar.

Desmonte veloz.card_desc: [Carga] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 3s tras usar Carga.

Formidable.card_desc: [Armadura] Te curas un 55% de tu salud máxima durante 3s cuando tu salud baja al 40% o menos. Esto puede ocurrir una vez cada 45s.

Fuerza invencible.card_desc: [Carga] Repeles a los enemigos alcanzados por Carga a {scale=800|200}.

Incinerador.card_desc: [Bólido] El tiempo de recarga de Bólido se reduce en {scale=0.4|0.4}s.

Lanzar.card_desc: [Carga] La distancia que recorres con Carga aumenta un {scale=15|15}%.

L\u00edder audaz.card_desc: [Armadura] Tus recargas activas se reducen un {scale=10|10}% tras conseguir una eliminación.

Llamas de Zeus.card_desc: [Escudo] Tu escudo tiene una duración infinita y su recarga se reduce en 2s.

Marca.card_desc: [Bólido] Curas {scale=100|100} PS por cada enemigo que alcances con Bólido.

Miradas asesinas.card_desc: [Bólido] Se reduce la recarga de Carga en {scale=0.6|0.6}s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Bólido.

Muro imponente.card_desc: [Escudo] Se reduce la recarga de Escudo en {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Necesidad extrema.card_desc: [Escudo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% al usar Escudo.

Objeto inamovible.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación que recibes de otros aumenta un {scale=5|5}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Persecuci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Bólido] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 3s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Bólido.

Quemadura.card_desc: [Bólido] El daño de Bólido aumenta un 30% e inflige un daño un 20% mayor por cada subsecuente objetivo alcanzado después del primero.

Transmisor de calor.card_desc: [Escudo] Cada vez que tu escudo recibe 1000 PS de daño, la recarga de Carga se reduce en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

\u00daltima resistencia.card_desc: [Escudo] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS cada 1s mientras Escudo esté activo y tengas un 40% o menos de salud.

Barreira Alta.card_desc: [Escudo] Reduz o intervalo do Escudo em {scale=0.8|0.8}s.

Busca implac\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=8|8}% por 3s ao atingir um inimigo com Bola de Fogo.

Carreira.card_desc: [Investida] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade de movimento por 3s após usar Investida.

Chamuscado.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Aumenta o dano da Bola de Fogo em 30% e causa 20% mais dano a cada inimigo atingido após o primeiro.

\u00c9gide.card_desc: [Escudo] Seu Escudo tem duração infinita e o intervalo é reduzido em 2s.

For\u00e7a Impar\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Investida] Aplica uma repulsão de {scale=800|200} aos inimigos atingidos pela Investida.

Formid\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Armadura] Você se cura em 55% da sua vida máxima no decorrer de 3s quando chega a 40% ou menos da sua vida máxima. Isso acontece a cada 45s.

Incinerar.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Reduz o intervalo da Bola de Fogo em {scale=0.4|0.4}s

L\u00edder temer\u00e1rio.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% seus intervalos ativos ao conseguir uma eliminação.

Marcar.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida por cada inimigo atingido pela Bola de Fogo.

Necessidade Extrema.card_desc: [Escudo] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento enquanto estiver usando o Escudo.

Objeto Im\u00f3vel.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a cura que receber de outros, enquanto estiver com 50% ou menos de vida.

Olhar Mortal.card_desc: [Bola de Fogo] Reduz o intervalo da Investida em {scale=0.6|0.6}s após acertar a Bola de Fogo em um inimigo.

Resist\u00eancia Final.card_desc: [Escudo] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida a cada 1s enqunto o Escudo estiver ativo e você estiver com 40% ou menos de vida.

Transferir Calor.card_desc: [Escudo] Reduz o intervalo da Investida em {scale=0.5|0.5}s a cada 1000 de dano que o Escudo recebe.

Viagem Segura.card_desc: [Investida] Ganha um escudo com {scale=150|150} de vida por 3s após usar Investida.

Voando Baixo.card_desc: [Investida] Aumenta a distância percorrida pela Investida em {scale=15|15}%.

\u0411\u0435\u0437\u043e\u043f\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Рывок] После Рывка вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=150|150} ед. на 3 с.

\u0412\u043e\u0437\u0432\u044b\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Осадный щит] Перезарядка щита сокращается на {scale=0.8|0.8} с.

\u0412\u044b\u0436\u0438\u0433\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Урон от Огненного шара по первой цели повышается на 30%, а по последующим – на 20%.

\u0413\u0440\u043e\u043c\u0438\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 40% и ниже вы восстанавливаете 55% от его максимального запаса в течение 3 с. Это может происходить каждые 45 с.

\u0418\u0441\u043f\u0435\u043f\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Перезарядка Огненного шара сокращается на {scale=0.4|0.4} c.

\u041a\u0430\u0432\u0430\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=150|150} ед.

\u041a\u043b\u0435\u0439\u043c\u043e.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед. за каждого врага, пораженного Огненным шаром.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u043e\u0434\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете от других на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.

\u041d\u0435\u0443\u0434\u0435\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Рывок] Рывок отбрасывает пораженных врагов на {scale=800|200} ед.

\u041e\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Щит] Скорость передвижения при использовании Щита увеличивается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u041e\u0442\u0432\u0430\u0436\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Устранения сокращают текущую перезарядку способностей на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041f\u043e\u0433\u0440\u0435\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас увеличивается на {scale=15|15} ед.

\u041f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0435\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Щит] Пока действует Щит, при уровне здоровья 40% и ниже вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед. в секунду.

\u041f\u0440\u0435\u0441\u043b\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Попадание по врагу Огненным шаром повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=8|8}% на 3 с.

\u0421 \u0440\u0430\u0437\u0431\u0435\u0.card_desc: [Рывок] После Рывка ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0422\u0435\u043f\u043b\u043e\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Щит] Каждые 1000 ед. урона, отраженные Щитом, сокращают перезарядку Рывка на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0423\u0431\u0438\u0439\u0441\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Огненный шар] Попадания по врагам Огненным шаром сокращают перезарядку Рывка на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u042d\u0433\u0438\u0434\u0430.card_desc: [Щит] Ваш щит действует бесконечно, а его перезарядка сокращается до 2 с.

Bezpieczna podr\u00f3\u017c.card_desc: [Szarża] Zapewnia tarczę o odporności {scale=150|150} pkt. na 3 s po użyciu Szarży.

Egida.card_desc: [Tarcza] Tarcza ma nieskończony czas trwania, a czas odnowienia umiejętności skraca się o 2 s.

Gor\u0105cy po\u015bcig.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Trafienie wroga Kulą ognia zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 3 s.

G\u00f3ruj\u0105ca bariera.card_desc: [Tarcza] Skraca czas odnowienia Tarczy o {scale=0.8|0.8} s.

Kawaler.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa poziom maks. zdrowia o {scale=150|150} PZ.

Kremacja.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Skraca czas odnowienia Kuli ognia o {scale=0.4|0.4} s.

Nadzwyczajny.card_desc: [Pancerz] Przywraca 55% maks. zdrowia przez 3 s, jeśli zdrowie spadnie do poziomu 40% maks. wartości lub niżej. Efekt może być powtórzony po 45 s.

Niepowstrzymana si\u0142a.card_desc: [Szarża] Wrogowie trafieni Szarżą zostają odrzuceni na {scale=800|200} jedn.

Niez\u0142omny lider.card_desc: [Pancerz] Eliminacje skracają aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=10|10}%.

Ostatni bastion.card_desc: [Tarcza] Przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ  co 1 s podczas trwania Tarczy lub jeśli twoje zdrowie spadnie do poziomu 40% lub poniżej.

Przewodzenie ciep\u0142a.card_desc: [Tarcza] Skraca czas odnowienia Szarży o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każde 1000 obrażeń pochłoniętych przez Tarczę.

Rozbieg.card_desc: [Szarża] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s po użyciu Szarży.

Spopielenie.card_desc: [Kula ognista] Zwiększa obrażenia zadawane przez Kulę ognia o 30% i zadaje 20% dodatkowych obrażeń za każdy kolejny trafiony cel po pierwszym.

Unieruchomienie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa otrzymywane od innych leczenie o {scale=5|5}%, jak długo twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Wielka potrzeba.card_desc: [Tarcza] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% podczas używania Tarczy.

Wyrzut.card_desc: [Szarża] Zwiększa pokonywany dystans przez Szarżę o {scale=15|15}%.

Zab\u00f3jczy wzrok.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Trafienie wroga Kulą ognia skraca czas odnowienia Szarży o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Znak.card_desc: [Kula ognia] Przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ za każdego wroga trafionego Kulą ognia.

Damga.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Ateş Topu ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Di\u015fli.card_desc: [Zırh] Maksimum Can değerin %40'ına veya altına düştüğünde 3sn içinde maksimum Canının %55'i kadar iyileş.

Durdurulamaz G\u00fc\u00e7.card_desc: [Hücum] Hücum ile vurduğun düşmanlara {scale=800|200} birimlik Geri İtme uygula.

G\u00fcvenli Yolculuk.card_desc: [Hücum] Hücum kullanımı sonrası 3sn boyunca {scale=150|150} Canlık bir Kalkan kazan.

H\u0131zl\u0131 Ba\u015flang\u0131\u00e7.card_desc: [Hücum] Hücum kullandıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 3sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Is\u0131 Aktar\u0131m\u0131.card_desc: [Kalkan] Kalkanının aldığı her 1000 hasar Hücum'un Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azaltır.

Kavur.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Ateş Topu'nun hasarını %30 artır ve ilkinden sonraki her vuruş için %20 daha fazla hasar ver.

Korkusuz Lider.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Koruma.card_desc: [Kalkan] Kalkanın süresizdir ve Bekleme Süresi 2sn azalır.

\u00d6ld\u00fcren Bak\u0131\u015flar.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Ateş Topu ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra Hücum'un Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

Son Direni\u015f.card_desc: [Kalkan] Kalkan etkinken ve %40 Can veya altında iken her 1 saniyede {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Ta\u015f\u0131nmaz Nesne.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Can veya altındayken diğerlerinden aldığın İyileştirmeyi %{scale=5|5} artır.

Tutu\u015ftur.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Ateş Topu'nun Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.4|0.4}sn azalt.

Yak\u0131n Takip.card_desc: [Ateş Topu] Ateş Topu ile bir düşmana vurduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 3sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} artır.
